children.text: All of the crack control bars have been installed, and any missing have been rectified while we were on site.
It is a requirement of section 5.3.7 Shrinkage cracking control of AS 2870 Residential Slabs and Footings, that

‘At re-entrant corners, two strips of 3-L8TM, or one strip of 3-L11TM or 3-N12 bar, shall be placed across the direction of potential cracking. All such reinforcement shall have a minimum length of 2 m’.
All of the crack control bars have been installed ready for concrete to be poured.
